name: obsidian-image-ocr
description: OCR for images via right-click menu using Alibaba Cloud OCR API

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release:patch: pnpm version patch && npm run release:post
scripts.release:minor: pnpm version minor && npm run release:post
scripts.release:major: pnpm version major && npm run release:post
scripts.release:post: git push && git push origin $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0)

author: Mark
